messages.title: 10 MORE YEARS OF BREXIT
messages.content: Johnson's plan will not resolve our future EU trade relationship - or the Tory civil war over Europe. But it will mean a hard exit from our biggest market, putting our farmers and exporters and the jobs they support at risk.

messages.title: FRESH VISION
messages.content: For the challenges we face LOCALLY, NATIONALLY, GLOBALLY. Lichfield & Burntwood needs an MP like Paul Ray. Committed to making our country a FAIRER, GREENER, BETTER place.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only Liberal Democrats want Brexit stopped.
Resolving local residents' problems regarding housing, public nuisance, and other facilities.

mentions.candidate: Local Councillor Paul Ray has been chosen by Liberal Democrats to champion Lichfield & Burntwood as their Parliamentary Candidate in this election.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Corbyn has always wanted Brexit and was willing to work with the Conservatives to get his own Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: It is a struggle without end: our whole government and parliament blocked out of our biggest market with no way back. Only the Liberal Democrats will keep Britain in the EU so we can develop our economy for a fairer, greener, brighter future. Liberal Democrats want Brexit stopped.
issues.economy: Develop our economy for a fairer, greener, brighter future.
issues.environment: - and get on to tackle the real challenges of our planet, including the climate crisis, reducing plastic waste and investment in renewable energy.

community.content: Paul has a record of resolving local residents' problems, including housing, public nuisance, and facilities in our district.

leaflet.personalStatement: Paul Ray has lived in Lichfield for 19 years and is married with three children. Paul has been a solicitor since 1997 and specialises in advising in childcare cases. Paul is a Councillor on Lichfield City and Walsall Councils, and was re-elected in 2019 with an increased personal vote. He is Chair of the Council Committee on Housing.

politicalExperience.achievements: Paul has been re-elected with an increased personal vote in Lichfield City and Walsall Councils.
